00034 class table extends rules
00035 {
00036     function parse ($rule_string)
00037     {
00038         $data = array();
00039         if (strpos($rule_string, "#")) {
00040             $data['comment'] = substr($rule_string, strpos($rule_string, "#") + '1');
00041             $rule_string =  substr($rule_string, '0', strpos($rule_string, "#"));
00042         }
00043 
00044         /*
00045          * Sanitize the rule string so that we can deal with '{foo' as '{ foo' in 
00046          * the code further down without any special treatment
00047          */
00048         $rule_string = preg_replace("/{/", " { ", $rule_string);
00049         $rule_string = preg_replace("/}/", " } ", $rule_string);
00050         $rule_string = preg_replace("/,/", " , ", $rule_string);
00051 
00052         foreach (preg_split("/[\s,\t]+/", $rule_string, '-1', PREG_SPLIT_NO_EMPTY) as $rule) {
00053             $rules[] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $rule);
00054         }
00055         
00056         $data['identifier'] = $rules['1'];
00057         for ($i = '0'; $i < count($rules); $i++) {
00058             switch ($rules[$i]) {
00059             case "":
00060                 break;
00061             case "persist":
00062                 $data['persist'] = true;
00063                 break;
00064             case "const":
00065                 $data['const'] = true;
00066                 break;
00067             case "file":
00068                 $i++;
00069                 if (!$data['file']) {
00070                     $data['file'] = $rules[$i];
00071                 } else {
00072                     if (!is_array($data['file'])) {
00073                         $_temp = $data['file'];
00074                         unset($data['file']);
00075                         $data['file'][] = $_temp;
00076                     }
00077                     $data['file'][] = $rules[$i];
00078                 }
00079                 break;
00080             case "{";
00081                 while (preg_replace("/[\s,]+/", "", $rules[++$i]) != "}") {
00082                     $data['data'][] = $rules[$i];
00083                 }
00084                 break;
00085             }
00086         }
00087         return $data;
00088     }
00089 
00090     function generate ()
00091     {
00092         $data = "";
00093         if ($this->rules) {
00094             foreach ($this->rules as $rule) {
00095                 if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00096                     $lines = preg_split("/\n/", stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00097                     $data .= "\n";
00098                     foreach ($lines as $line) {
00099                         $data .= "# ". $line. "\n";
00100                     }
00101                     continue;
00102                 }
00103                 $data .= "table ". $rule['identifier'];
00104                 if ($rule['persist']) {
00105                     $data .= " persist";
00106                 }
00107                 if ($rule['const']) {
00108                     $data .= " const";
00109                 }
00110                 if ($rule['file']) {
00111                     if (!is_array($rule['file'])) {
00112                         $data .= " file \"". $rule['file']. "\"";
00113                     } else {
00114                         foreach ($rule['file'] as $file) {
00115                             $data .= " file \"". $file. "\"";
00116                         }
00117                     }
00118                 }
00119                 if ($rule['data']) {
00120                     $data .= " {";
00121                     foreach ($rule['data'] as $data_object) {
00122                         $data .= " ". $data_object. ",";
00123                     }
00124                     $data = rtrim($data, ", ");
00125                     $data .= " }";
00126                 }
00127                 
00128                 if ($rule['comment']) {
00129                     $data .= " # ". trim(stripslashes($rule['comment']));
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 $data .= "\n";
00133             }
00134             $data .= "\n";
00135         }
00136         return $data;
00137     }
00138 }
00139
